Uses of Interface
it.polimi.ingsw.model.leadercard.SpecialAbility

Packages that use SpecialAbility
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.model.leadercard  

  • Uses of SpecialAbility in it.polimi.ingsw.model.leadercard

    Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.model.leadercard that implement SpecialAbility
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AdditionalProduction
    This class represents the special ability of leader cards of additional production.
    class  BiggerDeposit
    This class represents the special ability of leader cards of increment capacity of the deposit.
    class  CostLess
    This class represents the special ability of leader cards of decrement the purchase cost of the development cards
    class  MarketWhiteChange
    This class represents the special ability of leader cards of change a white marble of the market with another type of marble.

    SpecialAbility LeaderCardHandler.getLeaderActivePower​(int selected)
    Getter of the special ability of the active leader card that the player want to use.
    SpecialAbility LeaderCard.getSpecialAbility()
    Getter that returns the special ability of the leader card.
